attributes.action: Open to the public the documents that have been sealed for 100 years after the Dunblane Shootings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the Dunblane shooting some documents and reports were sealed in the so called "Public Interest" There is no place in todays society for Secrets after an event like this.  If certain persons or information has been subdued then the guilt lies with them and not the honest upstanding gun holders that were penalised.  It is therefore the Publics Right to know what and why the perpetrator was allowed, by the authoritites to remain at large and in possesion of firearms, enabling him to commit the heinous crime.
